title: 2 Bed 2 Bath Ready To Lease TODAY!!!
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 12', 'OR Text', '12', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 820 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Summerwood Apartment Homes offers spacious one and two bedroom floor plans.', 'Located minutes from the Downtown Hayward BART Station, Summerwood is also convenient to Bay Area businesses, restaurants and freeways.', 'Enjoy a beautiful playground area, large swimming pool and fitness center.', 'We are a pet friendly community, welcoming cats and dogs.', 'Come visit us and make Summerwood your new home.', 'Prices are subject to change based on availability and qualification of applicant, additional fees may apply, OAC.', 'Supplies are limited.', 'Pricing only available on specifically advertising unit and subject to the applicant’s qualification and OAC.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. #1525033', 'Features:', 'Controlled Access, Air Conditioning, Individual Climate Control, Refrigerator, Patio, Wheelchair Access, Additional Storage Unit Included with Select Floorplans, Balcony, Cable/Satellite Ready, Large Closets, Disposal, Dishwasher, Ceiling Fans, Carpet', 'Community Amenities:', 'Pets Allowed, Carport, Kids Activity Center, Gated Access, Night Patrol, Onsite Maintenance, Swimming Pool, State of the Art Fitness Center, Carpeting, Public Transportation and Access to I15 and I215, Covered Parking, Onsite Management, Laundry Facility', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy: Maximum Pets per Apartment: 2', '•\tWeight Limit: 35 Pounds', '•\tPet Rent per Month: $50.00', '•\tDeposit per Pet: $500.00 (Refundable)', '•\tPet Restrictions:', '•\tCats - Domesticated indoor cats only', '•\tDogs - restricted dog breeds are as follows:', '•\tDoberman, Chow-Chow, Siberian Husky, Saint Bernard, Shar Pei, German Shepherd, Doberman Pinscher, Alaskan Malamute, Akita, Rottweiler, Pit Bull (also known as American Staffordshire, American Pit Bull Terrier, Staffordshire Bull Terrier) and all mixes of all the above breeds', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'QdB5AZfVA']
